mapper.insert: insert into omakase.comment(comment_content, user_nickname, post_no) values(#{comment_content}, #{user_nickname}, #{post_no})
mapper.update: update omakase.comment set comment_like_cnt = comment_like_cnt+1 where comment_no = #{comment_no}
update omakase.comment set comment_content = #{comment_content} where comment_no = #{comment_no}
mapper.select: select * from omakase.comment where post_no = #{post_no} order by comment_date asc
